com.castlabs.sdk.thumbs

Class DataSourceThumbnailLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.castlabs.sdk.thumbs.DataSourceThumbnailLoader

  • public class DataSourceThumbnailLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads thumbnail data using a DataSource. You can create instances of this class manually for example by using the PlayerController.getDataSourceFactory() to create the DataSource.

    Note that if you are using ThumbsPlugin.createProvider(PlayerController, com.castlabs.android.player.models.ThumbnailDataTrack, String) there is no need to create an instance of the class manually.

    Since:
    4.0.0
